PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-13962008-07-30,  ,  TC,  , 
PrecisApproval of the appointment of A. MICHEL LAVIGNE of Brossard, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of ending May 11, 2012, in the place of Monique Forget Leroux.
Attachments
precis: Approval of the appointment of A. MICHEL LAVIGNE of Brossard, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of ending May 11, 2012, in the place of Monique Forget Leroux.
